lenders.name: Danni
lenders.loan_because: We are put on earth to help each other on our journey.  Kiva is a fun and easy and inexpensive way to bless someone who needs some support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mum to three precious children :-)

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It's a blessing to be able to give.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: Its easy, very little cost and helps small business people who are giving it a go but may not be able to obtain a loan otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: Registration of  people/company's trade marks/brands in Australia and around the world so they have exclusive rights to their names and avoid business name identity theft.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: the world needs it.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: When it rains, it doesn't rain everywhere, but everyone needs water.The water in the mountains is piped to people in the valley who received no rain.  Material wealth is the same, it rains in different places and God expects us to share the wealth.  Ensign 9/06 P77  .

lenders.name: kathy
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my blessings with others both locally and globally.

lenders.name: Triphina
lenders.loan_because: Giving is a blessing and I realise that there are many out there doing it tough so if we all do our bit no matter how big or small we are helping to ensure those less fortunate are in a position to help themselves and others.  It's about letting that Love flow.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to improve the quality of the health service for users.

lenders.name: Nichole
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to make a real contribution to others less fortunate and assist others in reaching their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Administration of government grant funds to Australian Indigenous Organisations.

lenders.name: Olwyn
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by the story on Oprah
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 11 and 12 year old children in a Government school in Canberra - Australia.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed provider of bookkeeping & business services

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: we are all a part of humanity. Only together do we truly embody the love of God.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teenagers develop faith in God and communicate their mistakes do not define who you are.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It lets me express my commitment to addressing hunger and development issues in a personal way.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing spiritual care for persons with life limiting illnesses.

lenders.name: Graham & Nella
lenders.loan_because: I think it is better to help people self help than to give handouts.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: In some small way, I am able to help those who do not have the benefits of a wealthy society. I display a bumper sticker on my car which reads 'Practice Random acts of Kindness' and I strive to do this every single day.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a volunteer palliative care support worker.
My role is to support the 'client' who has a life threatening illness and the family. I do this by home visits to the client, so that the carer can take some  mucn needed respite, I also visit patients in the palliative care ward of my local hospital

lenders.name: Dianne
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to make a difference in other people's lives. I am blessed to be living in such an abundant place as Australia and as a nation, we can afford to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the field of mental health from a practice framework of recognizing and acknowledging people's strengths and focusing on ability not disability.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Because I can, I guess I take for granted how lucky I am sometimes I am happy to help someone who genuinely needs it.

lenders.name: Lucy-Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my sons that there is "greater pleasure in giving than receiving".   I want to help others help themselves, and I love to help when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: First and foremost I'm mum to 3 beautiful boys and wife to Brendan.   I work in the airline industry.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I wanna make a difference for someone in this world

lenders.name: Flora
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to teach marketing at Deakin University in Melbourne.  Now I spend my days renovating our house and reading.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because:
I wish people to be independent and 
successful
and happy.
this opportunity starts people toward these.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a salesman for an insurance company.

lenders.name: Sally L
lenders.occupation: I\'m a full time Mum & I also work part time

lenders.name: Mariane and Len Ruvinsky
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people who are less fortunate than us.
lenders.occupational_info: Mariane is a Certified Medical Assistant.  I work in the Neurology Dept at Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center in Manchester, NH.  Len is an Engineer in the defense industry in Nashua, NH.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I CAN!  I appreciate the life I have and want others to have good lives also.  It's feels good to help out.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: Like most everybody I struggle to deal with everyday bills and issues, and forget about those less fortunate in other locations who even with just a little support can make a major impact to the lives of their family and broader community. I am sure that they will reciprocate in like measure to the best of their ability if afforded the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop voice and data solutions for satellite telephones that enable their wider application to enable emergency responders to deal man-made and natural disasters faster and more effectively.greg@pacificrimusa.net

lenders.name: Abi & Marty
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Valarie
lenders.loan_because: I want to end poverty and the associated suffering in the world.

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: WHY NOT?  it feels great to know your making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Im a Registered Nurse, i work in a hospital.

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.

lenders.name: leo
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand every now and then.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: though to us our lives may at times seem hard, it make me realise that there are many people less fortunate than us in the world, and the we in Australia are very lucky.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married mother of 4 gorgeous children.2 boys and 2 girls.I have been lucky enough to have been with my husband for 17 years and married to him for 10 of those years.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the position myself where I have had a great idea for a business, but had no funding. Imagine how different the world would be if everyone had the ability to develop their ideas? Also, I live in Australia. Our quality of life is ridiculously high. Fifty bucks to us is a carton of beer.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a graphic designer. I mainly specialise in logo designs and packaging design. I am also interested in writing, drawing, painting.

Find me on facebook. Daniel Abela.

lenders.name: Stella & Samson
lenders.loan_because: it would be great to help people be able to stand on their feet fiancially secure, and keep on giving by investing in the future.

lenders.name: Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe in good karma.  It's nice to know that just a LITTLE bit of money actually can make a BIG difference in somebody else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get loans for houses.  They come to me to help them find the best loan, instead of having to speak with several bank managers to find a good loan.  I don't actually give the money, I just help them with all the paperwork, and talk to the lenders for them. I save them time and money.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much but I am lucky to have what I do have.  So what I can do is share and help a dream come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I did work at a school before I had my first child, love working with children and watching them grow.  Now I am watching and teaching my child grow into a fine young adult.

lenders.name: GuardedGal
lenders.loan_because: I am committed to giving back to the global community from which I have learned so much over the years

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: There is no excuse not to!

lenders.name: Angela & Lance
lenders.loan_because: We care. Positive way to be able to give back something to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We invest in shares and property.

lenders.name: julianne and Rick
lenders.loan_because: i want to teach my children that they are very lucky to have what they have, and that there are children around the world that don't even have a bat and ball, let alone a tv, play station, wii, laptop and so on... So now my 5 lovely's are going to save there silver, to help other families get what they need in life.  Unfortunetly we don't have alot of money to help everyone, but if we can help in a tiny way then it will make the whole family happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise our 5 children while my partner runs his own business

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: To help others suceed
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Maths to secondary students

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves global assistance to better their lives and to find happiness and pride in what they do.

lenders.name: Steve & Traci
lenders.loan_because: We have visited developing countries and want to make a real difference.  Every person in the world deserves the chance to realise their dreams, and to live a happy life.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve designs and draws plans for the construction of buildings and houses.  Traci is having some time off work.  We live in Queensland, Australia.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: To overcome poverty, we must encourage human initiative and free-enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: Geography student.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I think the only thing better than helping people is helping them help themselves.  Love to see confidence and self esteem develop, especially in girls and women.
lenders.occupational_info: Single mum, full time student.

lenders.name: Patrick

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: A small donation can make a world of difference to people in need. In this country we are so fortunate. Its not asking alot of anyone to give to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Video, Photo and Music business. Mostly weddings, but also corporate and small jobs within the community.

lenders.name: Sandra

lenders.occupational_info: I work at the reception desk in the ward of a private hospital and organise all of the doctors and nurses records and results and welcome patients when they arrive and see them out the door as they leave.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone not as fortunate as I am.

lenders.name: Shanntelle

lenders.name: Robyn

Bernadette says:  I loan because I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: We live in Paris where Natalie (10) goes to a French school and I am an entrepreneur having founded Visibility Branding where I help entrepreneurs and individuals develop a strategy to build, market and express their brand.

I now have a job, my son is 20 & I have a very supportive partner.  I want to share my good fortune with others.  I believe in wealth distribution throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer phones and book people into courses at our college.  I also work on the computer, do filing and other office tasks

lenders.loan_because: I thought this was a great idea and would like to help. look forward to be a permanent lender lending more and more!

lenders.name: Joseph & Melanie

Living in the "Lucky Country" and being able to help others is a reward in it self.

First and foremost I am a mum to 2 gorgeous children, a daughter and a son.
 I also have an internet business that I run on ebay selling recycled clothing. Also we have a small business that we have been running for 3 years.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: this is one way that I can love Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: There are so many good people in the world that just need a little help. I love the idea that I have the ability to give someone a better chance at success & happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Teaching Assistant of Instructional Technology at a primary school, which means that I teach kids ages 5 - 8 how to use computers & technology to supplement their education.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I think it will make a bigger impact than giving to local charities
lenders.occupational_info: I work for global networking company

lenders.occupational_info: I am an aspiring entrepreneur with plans to develop a hospitality and tourism venture.

lenders.name: Bridgette
lenders.loan_because: it is my goal to become a better humanitarian to my world community...Knowing I have helped my fellow man is so empowering. I have recieved so much joy, love and gratitude for just being able to help another.
lenders.occupational_info: The job that I do is very negative. I meet people at the worst times in their lives. It has been my goal to leave the individuals that I deal with some self respect. I have to remember that at the end of the day we are ALL GODS children and should be treated accordingly.

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: I love the fact that a single donation can help several people over time and that my donation isn't just going into a charitable abyss. Great job Kiva!

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: It is my greatest pleasure to pay it forward for all the kindness and support that I have received as I built my business. I have been fortunate to be raised in a country that allows women to achieve great things and I want everyone in the world to be able to have the same opportunities that I have had.

lenders.name: Denyse
lenders.loan_because: I am truly blessed in my life and would love to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: My most  important work is ensuring that my son grows up in a giving, loving, peaceful world.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I manage music artists and put on live music shows.

lenders.name: Mr. Thornton
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.loan_because: because  planning to have business which i used  to do in the philippines  and the only problem is that i dont have enought money to start.
lenders.occupational_info: my job is hard i worked swing ship start at 8:00 clock at night to 4:00 in the morning which its hard for me having a kid get up early and  bring it to school. im terrible tired of being night worker

lenders.name: Robert & Katherine
lenders.loan_because: With the many blessings we enjoy, it is important to share them with others.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: it's great to lend a hand
lenders.occupational_info: I help organising big events and festivals with music, dance..great cultural events that are popular with young people in England.

lenders.name: Kazuhiro & Motome

And also because we are blessed in so many ways that we think we should do something in return.

We wish you all the best with your business!

lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs we appreciate the need for  startup and expansion support  for small businesses.

lenders.name: adrienne

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.loan_because: if you can afford to, why wouldn't you?  Lead by example.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We love to make a difference!

lenders.name: Randi
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much money myself, by North American standards, so I can appreciate the efforts of others to simply get by.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Simply because I have the funding and others don't.  I enjoy helping those in need.

lenders.name: Antony
lenders.loan_because: I've been very lucky and wish to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Brenda

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to be able to support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Nurse working for a major supermarket company in the UK dealing with employee health.

lenders.name: Susan

lenders.name: Global Ventures LLC
lenders.loan_because:
People all over the world want to work.  Kiva! provides some wonderful people the opportunity to realize their dreams...both the lenders and the borrowers.

"Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along." 
- Napoleon Hill  

"Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending." 
- Carl Bard 

"A small trouble is like a pebble. Hold it too close to your eye and it fills the whole world and puts everything out of focus. Hold it at a proper distance and it can be examined and properly classified. Throw it at your feet and it can be seen in its true setting, just one more tiny bump on the pathway of life." 
- Celia Luce
lenders.occupational_info: Deliver and Inspire

lenders.name: Heath
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of recruiters

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Its such a simple thing to do. It costs less than a dinner out for me. Yet, it can make such a difference. How often can one person really do that? Here is my chance, and yours too...

lenders.name: Sean & Liz

i have more than what is essential to survive...

lenders.name: Rio Americano Kiva Club
lenders.loan_because: The concept is simply amazing & what $25 can do to one person can help others too.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because:
Given that I have been born in a first world country with lots of opportunity, I think that it is important that I use what ever resourses are available to me to help out those in the developing world that don't have access to the opportunities that I have.  I also feel that this is a fantastic opportunity to not just donate money, but to donate money to people that will use this money to improve their lives and enhance their ability to improve their earning ability which will open up more opportunities for them. 

As the saying says: " Buy a man a fish and he will eat for the day, teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"

lenders.name: Jodi, Jack, and Lily
lenders.loan_because: It is a great lesson for my children and it feels good to give!

lenders.name: Michael Hurst
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle against all odd's. I havent had it as tough as some here requesting loans, but I can help them a little to achive their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Water Treatment Industry. I clean mud and nasties out of the water to make it crystal clean and safe to drink.

lenders.name: Louise
lenders.loan_because: You reap what you sow
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mum with two children, and I study psychotherapy part-time

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I have always been blessed in my life. It is only right that I attempt to share my blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large home improvement based retail store. I sell major appliances and some small appliances to individuals, property managers and builders.

lenders.name: Steph
lenders.loan_because: i am a single mum and i am grateful for everything i have and the opportunities i have had and wish to pass on something to help another person achieve their dreams also.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a the Coordinator for a church-based Community Service in Adelaide, South Australia. We give away free groceries to disadvantaged people to help them feed their families. We establish relationship with these people in order to guide and encourage them to find opportunites in which to improve their lives and become self sufficient. We are a Christian church-based service and endeavour to show God's love through what we do. We believe that we are God's hands and feet literally.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I love that I can connect with people half a world away.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on exciting medical technology that can help paralyzed and locked-in people walk and talk.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can and should.  It's my social obligation.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell commercial flooring and installation services.  I like my job because I'm a "people person" and I get to meet lots of interesting people. Plus I am not stuck in an office all day. :-)

lenders.name: RICHY & ALLY
lenders.loan_because: IT'S A GREAT FEELING TO GIVE A LITTLE!!

lenders.name: Callie
lenders.loan_because: it's fun!
lenders.occupational_info: I raise $$ for cancer research

lenders.name: Alanah
lenders.loan_because: Kiva not only allows you to help others help themselves but you can actually see your loan changing the lives of others.

lenders.name: Collins
lenders.loan_because: we are called to demonstrate Godly character..."clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience..." Col. 3:12
lenders.occupational_info: I have recently married a wonderful man, Jared, and we are currently in transition to move to China to pursue his international business employment.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: it's the best retail therapy EVER!

lenders.name: Peg & Denise
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to have so much!!  We would like to share it and help others make their lives better.

lenders.name: Angus & Sean
lenders.loan_because: We were lucky to be born in a prosperous country where we have everything we need.  Our parents want us to learn that our good fortune is a privilege and teach us how we can help others around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now 9 and am in grade 4 this year and my brother Sean is 6 years old and in grade 1. We've been loaning now since I was 3 and Sean was 5 mnths old!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: this is a great idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in financial markets.

lenders.name: Rashmi
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone get the freedom to live their life and be in control of it.
lenders.occupational_info: My job involves working with people and especially those that are disadvantaged. I believe that I would not like to hurt another human being knowingly and if I can assist them in any then I am blessed.

lenders.name: Savahna
lenders.loan_because:
Because I have been given must I to must give,
Because of thy great bounty Lord each day I live,
I shall divide my gifts from thee with every brother that i see,
Who has the need of help from me.

Because I have been sheltered fed by thy good care, 
I cannot see another's lack and I not share,
My glowing fire my loaf of bread my roofs safe shelter over head,
That he too may be comforted.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a single parent living in Australia looking after my three little girls

lenders.name: Team Casey
lenders.loan_because: even one person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with an agency that develops internship programs to help companies and college students connect with each other.  My husband works in Sales for Procter & Gamble.

lenders.occupation: Founder of a nonprofit creating teen entrepreneurs

lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a nurse but will be starting my new career as a music teacher in primary schools next year.

STORE.

A small dollar goes a long way for these people.  i'm glad I can help.

lenders.loan_because: Until I can help in a big way I want to help in small ways as often as I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I go to University where i study teaching and business...I also have 3 jobs to help me get by.

lenders.loan_because: i'm able.

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: I am delighted to find a way to help others and know that my money is going directly to the person who needs a little help to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work  in a Hospital Laboratory as a Medical Laboratory Technician.  We provide a 24hr service doing tests that help Doctors to diagnose and treat patients.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: cela nous aide à réaliser des rêves...

lenders.name: Jihed&Ahnie
lenders.loan_because: I was blessed with enough to share.

lenders.name: Marnie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others. I also like to hear about other people's passions.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a global company that develops networking technology that helps people across the world stay connected. I manage Programs that help our business partners.

lenders.name: Geneva Girls
lenders.loan_because: We live in the U.S. and have so many wonderful opportunities available to us.  In raising our daughter(s), we hope to instill in them the strong desire to help others knowing that life is about sharing and caring for others.  When we adopted our daughter 2005 we noticed that her name was given with "Best Wishes" and "Hope" that she would be happy.  We feel that the best way to accomplish this is by giving this to others.  The world we live in will be a reflection of what we give from ourselves to others.
lenders.occupational_info: By joining forces with other families who have been blessed by adoption, we hope to provide support to women in other parts of the world who could benefit from our help.  Women are very fortunate in the U.S. to have so many opportunities to become anything (including business owners).  We hope to support women's business in other areas of the world where opportunities do not come so easily.  We send "Best Wishes" and "Hope that you are Happy" and successful.

lenders.name: Donal
lenders.loan_because: This appears to be a simple, low risk, practical approach to helping somebody with real needs.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange long term financing for productive (income earning) projects in developing countries.

lenders.name: Arthur Family
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: little things count.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in IT.

lenders.name: len,adrienne and family
lenders.loan_because: we like for people who dont have the ability to self fund there ventures to find support through our family
lenders.occupational_info: giving back to other communities

lenders.name: Raquel and Stephen
lenders.loan_because: We love to help others.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I can, and therefore to do anything less would be wrong
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the people of Bolton, England.  My job is to use the money that is collected from the people of Bolton in taxes to help support older people who live in Bolton who can not live at home safely.  I ask them what help they need to stay safe in their own homes and I then try to give them that help.  It may be getting someone to help them wash or dress, or a hot meal delivered every day.  Anything that will allow them to live safely at home for as long as possible. PS My dog Pippin says 'Hi!'

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to change someones life

lenders.name: Shanlee
lenders.loan_because: Just a small amount of money can make such a big difference to someone on the other side of the world who is less fortunate.

lenders.name: carlos
lenders.loan_because: for so little we all together can do so much difference for them, it's just a great feeling.

lenders.name: Terrence
lenders.loan_because: i should

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I know that most people are honest and that sometimes a small helping hand can make a big difference, insights learned from being blind and in a wheelchair.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on programmes for computers, mostly for small businesses.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe I can make the difference in someones else life and that makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate the access of information

lenders.name: Manny
lenders.loan_because: I've been there and done that!

lenders.name: Tomcat
lenders.loan_because: Helping a particular person seems somehow better than just sending money to some faceless charity.  And of course, if it gets paid back, we can loan the same money out again.
lenders.occupational_info: Engineer. I design gas furnaces for heating of homes.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: A little goes a long way!  I am a firm believer in microfinance, and Kiva.org offers everyone the opportunity to make a huge difference to a life by empowering individuals to provide for themselves.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a simple solution to a complex problem.  Poverty is rarely a natural disaster but a result of inequitable and unjust human social factors.  It is within our power to say "people, this is not good enough!".  Thanks Kiva for providing such a mechanism and shining a bright light in a darkening world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a counsellor, so people come to me to talk over problems.  I help them come to understand what has caused their problems and assist them to discover ways to resolve and prevent these.

lenders.name: tracy
lenders.loan_because: I can see who Im helping out & it feels good

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I care about the people of Lebanon and want to help, I have been there and feel a connection with the people
lenders.occupational_info: I am a waitress and work hard for my money, but feel fortunate that I have a job and can help other people, when i am able

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I believe that children are our future.

lenders.name: Sally-Ann
lenders.occupation: PhD student, mother of two children
lenders.loan_because: it can empower others
lenders.occupational_info: I am at university as an older student., studying for my doctorate in psychology. I admire people that can take a stand and help their lives and their families lives by empowering themselves.

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: It is one small way to share the bounty we enjoy in this country and a way of letting people know the true "American spirit"
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investigative TV reporter in the city of Atlanta, Georgia.

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.occupational_info: Making people outstanding!

lenders.name: Fiona

lenders.occupational_info: I am a choir director and voice teacher, retired now from teaching junior high choirs.

lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing executive, I help companies  sell more products and be more profitable by expanding peoples' awareness of their products/services.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I receive great pleasure from assisting people to step into their personal power and reap rewards for their efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired nurse and counselor.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: This is a personal extension of the credit union philosophy of "People Helping People."
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Credit Union, which is a non-profit financial cooperative.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: the world would be a better place if everyone helped each other.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.occupation: run a non-profit business women\'s group

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want people around the world to know that Americans care about their welfare and want to share our freedom and prosperity with all.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and manage websites for my city's economic development and tourism agencies.

lenders.name: The Allyn Family
lenders.loan_because: I want my children to understand that simple actions can make a great impact and that they are not too small to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help my children to become the best adults they can possibly be.

lenders.name: Kathie/Tyler
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: Capturing the spoken word and recording it for posterity.

lenders.name: Marianna
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a hand up to someone rather than a hand out.  Someone once helped me and my children, now it is my turn.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from accounting but work at a recreational company by serving others at dances, movies, concerts, etc.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people out of poverty.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help others. To quote Deepak Chopra, "Money is like blood, it must flow." May these small contributions lead to waves of prosperity throughout the world.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to be sucessful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager in a company that repairs ships.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky and have enough for myself and my family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company hiring people to work, training staff and helping managers understand the needs of their staff.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the right to make a decent life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a designer-maker and artist.  I design all sorts of crazy rubbish!

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help others improve their lives.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because:
There are so many things that I take for granted....my health, my wealth, my education....It's time to help those who can help themselves....

I loan because I can...and it is the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I take photographs for several small weekly newspapers in the Chicago area.

lenders.name: CBH
lenders.loan_because: It is a good use of my money.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: where we are born is an accident of birth. I believe I should use what chance has given me to enrich the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Finance and History at the University of Florida.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: Its a small amount which put together with everyone elses will really make an impact.  This site is a great idea.

lenders.name: HUGH C.
lenders.loan_because: this just struck me as the right thing to do. Such a simple concept that really works. We have so much,,,they have so little.
lenders.occupational_info: Just trying to do my share.
